analyzed: pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par 'gyur bas /
translated: In order to bring beings to maturity for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: sems can lus tha dad pa la mos pa rnams la snang ba dang shes pa'i rjes su 'gro bas rang gi lus de kho na bzhin du skye bar mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: sems can lus tha dad pa la mos pa rnams la snang ba dang shes pa'i rjes su 'gro bas rang gi lus de kho na bzhin du skye bar mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: he accomplishes the manifestation of birth in that very body, in accordance with the aspirations of beings who have different bodies.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis sam /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis sam /
translated: Having filled two great trichiliocosms,

original: gsum mam / bzhi'am /
analyzed: gsum mam / bzhi'am /
translated: three, four,

original: lnga'am / bcu'am /
analyzed: lnga'am / bcu'am /
translated: five, ten,

original: nyi shu'am / sum cu'am /
analyzed: nyi shu'am / sum cu'am /
translated: twenty, thirty,

original: bzhi bcu'am / lnga bcu nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag rgyas par bkang ste /
analyzed: bzhi bcu'am / lnga bcu nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar dag rgyas par bkang ste /
translated: forty, fifty, up to countless,

original: sems can lus tha dad pa la mos pa rnams la snang ba dang / shes pa'i rjes su 'gro bas rang gi lus de kho na bzhin du skye bar mngon par sgrub bo //
analyzed: sems can lus tha dad pa la mos pa rnams la snang ba dang / shes pa'i rjes su 'gro bas rang gi lus de kho na bzhin du skye bar mngon par sgrub bo //
translated: in order to manifest his own body in the same way as the bodies of those sentient beings who have different bodies and different aspirations.

original: de ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g-yo la /
analyzed: de ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g-yo la /
translated: Endowed with such knowledge, he does not move from one buddha-field,üîΩbut appears in countless buddha-fields and circles of assemblies.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams na yang snang bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pa la sogs pa shes nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g-yo ba la zhes bya ba'i bar lnga pa'i ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams na yang snang bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i khams 'jig pa la sogs pa shes nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g-yo ba la zhes bya ba'i bar lnga pa'i ste /
translated: Having understood the destruction of the desire realm, etc., up to ‚Äúwithout moving from one buddha-field,‚Äù is the fifth.

original: ji snyed pa 'dod pa de snyed ston zhes bya ba'i de'i'o //
analyzed: ji snyed pa 'dod pa de snyed ston zhes bya ba'i de'i'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHe manifests as many as desired‚Äù is the sixth.

original: de la sa'i khams la sogs pa ni yul dang mtshan nyid kyis shes par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de la sa'i khams la sogs pa ni yul dang mtshan nyid kyis shes par rig par bya ste /
translated: The elements of earth, etc. should be understood by way of their object and their characteristic.

original: ji ltar yul gyis she na /
analyzed: ji ltar yul gyis she na /
translated: How by way of their object?

original: chung ba ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: chung ba ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul lo //
translated: The small object is the object of the consciousness as retribution of the stage of non-concentration.

original: rgya chen por gyur pa ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: rgya chen por gyur pa ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i sa pa'i rnam par smin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yul lo //
translated: The great object is the object of the consciousness as retribution of the stage of concentration.

original: tshad med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: tshad med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo //
translated: The immeasurable object is the object of the TathƒÅgatas.

original: ji ltar na mtshan nyid kyis she na /
analyzed: ji ltar na mtshan nyid kyis she na /
translated: How by way of their characteristic?

original: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i sgo nas te /
analyzed: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba'i sgo nas te /
translated: By way of the differentiation of their general and particular characteristics.

original: lus rags pa dang / phra ba ni gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyi lus su rig par bya ste go rims bzhin no //üîΩ'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa yang /
analyzed: lus rags pa dang / phra ba ni gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyi lus su rig par bya ste go rims bzhin no // 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa yang /
translated: The gross and subtle body should be understood as the body of sentient beings with form and without form, respectively.

original: yul dang mtshan nyid kyis shes par bya ste /
analyzed: yul dang mtshan nyid kyis shes par bya ste /
translated: The desire realm, etc. should be understood by way of their object and their characteristic.

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi mi rnams kyi yul ji snyed pa ni chung ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi mi rnams kyi yul ji snyed pa ni chung ba'o //
translated: The domain of humans in the desire realm is small.

original: lha rnams kyi yul ni rgya chen por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: lha rnams kyi yul ni rgya chen por gyur pa'o //
translated: The domain of the gods is vast.

original: gzugs kyi khams kyi rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i yul ni chung ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams kyi rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i yul ni chung ba'o //
translated: The domain of the form realm, with its conceptualization and analysis, is small.

original: rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i yul ni rgya chen por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa'i yul ni rgya chen por gyur pa'o //
translated: The domain without conceptualization or analysis is vast.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sngar chos 'di par gyur pa'i so so'i skye @225b po rnams kyi yul ni chung ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sngar chos 'di par gyur pa'i so so'i skye @225b po rnams kyi yul ni chung ba'o //
translated: The domain of ordinary beings in the formless realm is small.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ni rgya che ba'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ni rgya che ba'o //
translated: The domain of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas is vast.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul ni tshad med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul ni tshad med pa'o //
translated: The domain of the tathƒÅgatas is immeasurable.

original: sems can rnams kyi lus rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lus rnam par dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa lus ma 'dra ba dang 'dra ba shes pa la mkhas pa ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi lus rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa dang / lus rnam par dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa lus ma 'dra ba dang 'dra ba shes pa la mkhas pa ste /
translated: The skill in knowing the classification of beings‚Äô bodies, the skill in knowing the analysis of bodies, and the skill in knowing the similarity and dissimilarity of bodies.

original: rigs gzhan dang rang gi rigs kyi bye brag gis rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs gzhan dang rang gi rigs kyi bye brag gis rig par bya'o //
translated: One should understand it by means of the other families and the distinctions within one's own family.

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su snang bar gyur pa yin zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i lus ston to /
analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su snang bar gyur pa yin zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i lus ston to /
translated: The phrase appear in the circles of the retinue indicates the kind of body that is shown.

original: // / de ltar snod kyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bya ba bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar snod kyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bya ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the purification of the buddhaverse by means of the application of mastery over the receptacle world,

original: sems can gyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ston te /
analyzed: sems can gyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ston te /
translated: he teaches the application of mastery over the world of sentient beings.

original: de la sems can gyi 'jig rten la dbang ba ni de 'gugs pa la dbang ba'o //
analyzed: de la sems can gyi 'jig rten la dbang ba ni de 'gugs pa la dbang ba'o //
translated: Mastery over the world of sentient beings is mastery over summoning them.

original: de'i sbyor pa ni gdul bya'i lus dang sems dang mthun pa'i lus dang sems ston pa ste /
analyzed: de'i sbyor pa ni gdul bya'i lus dang sems dang mthun pa'i lus dang sems ston pa ste /
translated: Its application is the manifestation of a body and mind in accord with the bodies and minds of those to be trained.

original: gang gi phyir de sems can rnams kyi lus rnam par dbye ba dang / mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa ci 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu de lta de ltar rang gi lus kun du ston te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de sems can rnams kyi lus rnam par dbye ba dang / mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa ci 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu de lta de ltar rang gi lus kun du ston te /
translated: Because he manifests his body in this way and that in those and those buddha-fields and in those and those circles of assembly, in accordance with the differences in the bodies of beings, their inclinations, and their aspirations.

original: de dge sbyong gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: de dge sbyong gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su dge sbyong gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: In circles of assembly of ascetics he manifests the color and form of an ascetic.

original: bram ze'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su bram ze'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to //üîΩrgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su rgyal rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //üîΩrje'u rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su rje'u rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: bram ze'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su bram ze'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to // rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su rgyal rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to // rje'u rigs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su rje'u rigs kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: In circles of assembly of brahmans he manifests the color and form of a brahman.üîΩIn circles of assembly of nobles he manifests the color and form of a noble.üîΩIn circles of assembly of householders he manifests the color and form of a householder.

original: khyim bdag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su khyim bdag gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su khyim bdag gi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: In circles of assembly of gods he manifests the color and form of a god.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: In the retinue of the gods of the Heaven of the Four Kings, he manifests the color and form of the gods of the Heaven of the Four Kings.

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su sum cu rtsa gsum gyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su sum cu rtsa gsum gyi kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: In the retinue of the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three, he manifests the color and form of the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three.

original: de bzhin 'thab bral gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su tshangs pa'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to //üîΩde nyan @226a * //
analyzed: de bzhin 'thab bral gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / tshangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su tshangs pa'i kha dog dang gzugs ston to // de nyan @226a * //
translated: Likewise, in the retinue of the gods of the Heaven Free from Strife, the Heaven of Joy, the Heaven of Delighting in Emanations, the Heaven of Making Use of Others‚Äô Emanations, and the Brahma Heaven, he manifests the color and form of the Brahma gods.

original: thos kyi gdul bya'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: thos kyi gdul bya'i sems can rnams la nyan thos kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: To the disciples who are to be guided by ≈õrƒÅvakas, he manifests the body, color, and form of a ≈õrƒÅvaka.üîΩTo the disciples who are to be guided by pratyekabuddhas, he manifests the body, color, and form of a pratyekabuddha.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi gdul bya'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi gdul bya'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: For sentient beings who are to be guided by pratyekabuddhas, they display the body, color, and form of a pratyekabuddha.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gdul bya'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i gdul bya'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: For sentient beings who are to be guided by bodhisattvas, they display the body, color, and form of a bodhisattva.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul bya'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul bya'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang kha dog dang gzugs ston to //
translated: For sentient beings who are to be guided by a tathagata, they display the body, color, and form of a tathagata.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i sems can de dag gi mos pa rab 'byam de dang / de dag tu de kho na bzhin du rang gi lus rnam par phye ba ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i sems can de dag gi mos pa rab 'byam de dang / de dag tu de kho na bzhin du rang gi lus rnam par phye ba ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: O son of the conquerors, in that way, for the sake of the infinite aspirations of those sentient beings in inexpressibly many buddhafields, they display their own bodies in a corresponding way, in a variety of forms.

original: de ltar sems can la dbang ba'i sbyor ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar sems can la dbang ba'i sbyor ba bstan nas /
translated: Having thus explained the application of power over sentient beings,

original: don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi ye shes gnyis kyis ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ston to //üîΩde la don dam pa'i ye shes ni rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud yongs su mi gcod pas /
analyzed: don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi ye shes gnyis kyis ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba ston to // de la don dam pa'i ye shes ni rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud yongs su mi gcod pas /
translated: It shows the application to the mastery of the intuition of the ultimate and the intuition of the conventional, which is the full realization of intuition.

original: lus su rnam par rtog pa thams cad med pa dang / lus mnyam pa nyid thob pas ston to //üîΩgang gi phyir de lus su rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing /
analyzed: lus su rnam par rtog pa thams cad med pa dang / lus mnyam pa nyid thob pas ston to // gang gi phyir de lus su rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing /
translated: Therein, the intuition of the ultimate is shown by the absence of all conceptual thought of body and by the attainment of the sameness of body, since it does not cut off the continuum of self and others.

original: lus mnyam pa nyid thob pas zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: lus mnyam pa nyid thob pas zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: For it is said, ‚ÄúSince he is free from all conceptual thought of body and has attained the sameness of body.üîΩ‚Äù

original: 'dis ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong ma yin pa'i don dam pa'i ye shes yongs su bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong ma yin pa'i don dam pa'i ye shes yongs su bstan pa yin no //
translated: This shows the intuition of the ultimate, which is not common to the disciples and hermit buddhas.

original: kun rdzob kyi ye shes ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa'i phyogs shes pa'i phyir sems can gyi lus la sogs pa zhes bas ston te /
analyzed: kun rdzob kyi ye shes ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / gnyis ka ma yin pa'i phyogs shes pa'i phyir sems can gyi lus la sogs pa zhes bas ston te /
translated: The intuition of the conventional is shown by the words ‚Äúthe bodies of sentient beings, etc.,‚Äù because it knows the side of affliction, of purification, and of neither.

original: gang gi phyir des sems can gyi lus kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir des sems can gyi lus kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: Because he knows the bodies of sentient beings.

original: zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / shes pa'i lus dang / chos kyi lus dang /
analyzed: zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / shes pa'i lus dang / chos kyi lus dang /
translated: He knows the body of the realm of beings, the body of the maturation of karma, the body of the ≈õrƒÅvakas, the body of the pratyekabuddhas, the body of the bodhisattvas, the body of the TathƒÅgatas, the body of knowledge, the body of dharmas,

original: nam mkha'i lus kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i lus kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: and he knows the body of space.

original: de la sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten dang / de skye ba'i rgyu las kyis ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de la sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten dang / de skye ba'i rgyu las kyis ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs su rig par bya'o //
translated: Therein, the bodies of sentient beings and the world of their environment, and the cause of their arising, karma, should be known as the side of affliction.

original: theg pa gsum ni rnam par byang ba'i phyogs te /
analyzed: theg pa gsum ni rnam par byang ba'i phyogs te /
translated: The three vehicles are the side of purification.

original: de yang shes pa gang dang / chos gang gis rab tu phye ba'o //
analyzed: de yang shes pa gang dang / chos gang gis rab tu phye ba'o //
translated: And that is distinguished by the knowledge of which dharmas.

original: nam mkha'i lus ni gnyis ka ma yin pa'i @226b phyogs so //
analyzed: nam mkha'i lus ni gnyis ka ma yin pa'i @226b phyogs so //
translated: The body of space is the side that is neither of those two.

original: des sems can rnams kyi sems dang / bsam pa mngon par sgrub pa kun du shes nas 'dod na sems can gyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: des sems can rnams kyi sems dang / bsam pa mngon par sgrub pa kun du shes nas 'dod na sems can gyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: Having understood the mental activity and thoughts of sentient beings, if he wishes, he can transform the bodies of sentient beings into his own body.

original: de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / shes pa'i lus dang / chos kyi lus dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / shes pa'i lus dang / chos kyi lus dang /
translated: In the same way, he can transform the body of a realm, the body of the ripening of karma, the body of a ≈õrƒÅvaka, the body of a pratyekabuddha, the body of a bodhisattva, the body of a tathƒÅgata, the body of knowledge, the body of Dharma,

original: nam mkha'i lus kyang rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i lus kyang rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: and the body of space into his own body.

original: de sems can gyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par sgrub pa kun du shes nas /
analyzed: de sems can gyi sems dang bsam pa mngon par sgrub pa kun du shes nas /
translated: Having understood the mental activity and thoughts of sentient beings,

original: de 'dod na sems can gyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
analyzed: de 'dod na sems can gyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo //
translated: if he wishes, he can transform the bodies of sentient beings into his own body.

original: de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / shes pa'i lus dang / chos kyi lus dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhing gi lus dang / las rnam par smin pa'i lus dang / nyan thos kyi lus dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / shes pa'i lus dang / chos kyi lus dang /
translated: Likewise, he blesses the field body, the body of the ripening of karma, the ≈õrƒÅvaka body, the pratyekabuddha body, the bodhisattva body, the body of the tathƒÅgatas, the body of consciousness, the body of phenomena,

original: nam mkha'i lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo zhes bya ba de la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob bo zhes bya ba de la /
translated: and the body of space as his own body.

original: sems can gyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems can gyi lus rang gi lus su byin gyis rlob ces bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúBlessing the bodies of sentient beings as his own body‚Äù

original: dbang de dang de la bya ba sgrub pa'i sbyor ba mtshungs pa nyid yongs su ston to //
analyzed: dbang de dang de la bya ba sgrub pa'i sbyor ba mtshungs pa nyid yongs su ston to //
translated: teaches the sameness of the application of accomplishing activities in those and those empowerments.

original: de la sems can gyi lus rnams ni las dang / skye ba dang nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bye brag dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa'i khams kyi bye brag gis rab tu shes pa ste /
analyzed: de la sems can gyi lus rnams ni las dang / skye ba dang nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bye brag dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa'i khams kyi bye brag gis rab tu shes pa ste /
translated: Therein, the bodies of sentient beings are known by the distinctions of karma, birth, and the afflictions, and by the distinctions of the realms with form and without form.

original: gang gi phyir de sems can rnams kyi las kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de sems can rnams kyi las kyi lus kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: Because he knows the body of sentient beings‚Äô karma.

original: rnam par smin pa'i lus nyid dang / nyon mongs pa'i lus nyid dang / gzugs kyi lus nyid dang / gzugs med pa'i lus nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i lus nyid dang / nyon mongs pa'i lus nyid dang / gzugs kyi lus nyid dang / gzugs med pa'i lus nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: He knows the body of karmic maturation itself, the body of afflictions, the body of form, and the formless body.

original: zhing gi lus rnams ni stong la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bye brag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i bye brag dang / chol ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis shes te /
analyzed: zhing gi lus rnams ni stong la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bye brag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i bye brag dang / chol ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis shes te /
translated: The bodies of realms are known through the distinctions of world systems such as the thousand-fold world system and so on, and through the distinctions of afflicted and unafflicted world systems, and through the distinctions of the trichiliocosm and so on.

original: gang gi phyir zhing gi lus rnams kyi chung du nyid rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhing gi lus rnams kyi chung du nyid rab tu shes so //
translated: Because he knows the smallest of the bodies of realms.

original: rgya chen por gyur pa nyid dang / tshad med pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can nyid dang / rnam par dag pa nyid dang / chol ba nyid dang / steng g-yogs med pa nyid dang / ngos phyal ba nyid dang / 'jug pa'i khyim can nyid dang /
analyzed: rgya chen por gyur pa nyid dang / tshad med pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can nyid dang / rnam par dag pa nyid dang / chol ba nyid dang / steng g-yogs med pa nyid dang / ngos phyal ba nyid dang / 'jug pa'i khyim can nyid dang /
translated: It is vast, immeasurable, defiled, pure, open, uncovered, exposed, and has an entrance.

original: phyogs kyi dra ba @227a * //
analyzed: phyogs kyi dra ba @227a * //
translated: It is the net of the directions.

original: rnam par dbye ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is the division of the directions.

original: chol ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi don ni sa dang por bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: chol ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi don ni sa dang por bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of the words ‚Äúopen‚Äù and so on is as explained in the first stage.

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnams ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi bye brag dang / gang zag med pas brda tsam du zad pa nyid kyis shes te /
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnams ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi bye brag dang / gang zag med pas brda tsam du zad pa nyid kyis shes te /
translated: The action of the maturation of karma, and the bodies of the ≈õrƒÅvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and bodhisattvas are known by the differences of their general and specific characteristics, and by the absence of a person, which is just a convention.

original: gang gi phyir las rnam par smin pa'i lus rnams kyi rnam par phye ba dang / brda yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir las rnam par smin pa'i lus rnams kyi rnam par phye ba dang / brda yang rab tu shes so //
translated: Because they know the distinctions and the symbolic conventions of bodies that are the results of evolutionary actions.

original: nyan thos kyi lus rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnams kyi rnam par phye ba dang / brda yang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos kyi lus rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus rnams kyi rnam par phye ba dang / brda yang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: They know the distinctions and the symbolic conventions of the bodies of the disciples, the bodies of the hermit buddhas, and the bodies of the bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams ni ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas ston te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams ni ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas ston te /
translated: The bodies of the transcendent lords are shown by their full enlightenment.

original: byang chub tu smon lam btab nas dga' ldan du skyes pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas sprul pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi sku gdung gi ring bsrel byin gyis brlabs pa gang dag yin pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sku gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub tu smon lam btab nas dga' ldan du skyes pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas sprul pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi sku gdung gi ring bsrel byin gyis brlabs pa gang dag yin pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sku gang yin pa dang /
translated: The body of the bodhisattva who has made the vow to awaken and has been born in the Tu·π£ita heaven, the emanation body of the Buddha, the body of transformation that is blessed by the relics of the TathƒÅgata, and the body of evolution.

original: 'od zer gang gis sems can rnams 'gugs pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems rnam par grol ba thun mong ba gang yin pa dang / mngon par mtho ba'i rgyu thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: 'od zer gang gis sems can rnams 'gugs pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems rnam par grol ba thun mong ba gang yin pa dang / mngon par mtho ba'i rgyu thun mong ma yin pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang /
translated: and the uncontaminated realm of the TathƒÅgatas,

original: ma chags pa'i ye shes gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: ma chags pa'i ye shes gang yin pa ste /
translated: and the wisdom of non-attachment.

original: gang gi de dag thams cad mdzad pa de dag gi bye brag gis rab tu shes pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi de dag thams cad mdzad pa de dag gi bye brag gis rab tu shes pa ste /
translated: One understands them through their distinctions.

original: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: Because one understands the body of the TathƒÅgatas, the very body of perfect enlightenment.

original: smon lam gyi sku nyid dang / sprul pa'i sku nyid dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi sku nyid dang / gzugs dang / mtshan ma dang / dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyi sku nyid dang / 'od kyi sku nyid dang / yid kyi sku nyid dang /
analyzed: smon lam gyi sku nyid dang / sprul pa'i sku nyid dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi sku nyid dang / gzugs dang / mtshan ma dang / dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan gyi sku nyid dang / 'od kyi sku nyid dang / yid kyi sku nyid dang /
translated: the body of aspiration, the body of emanation, the body of blessing, the body of form, signs, and the adornment of excellent characteristics, the body of light, the body of mind,

original: bsod nams kyi sku nyid dang / chos kyi sku nyid dang / ye shes kyi sku nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi sku nyid dang / chos kyi sku nyid dang / ye shes kyi sku nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: the body of merit, the body of phenomena, and the body of wisdom.

original: shes pa'i lus rnams ni thos pa dang / bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pa'i bye brag dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pa'i bye brag dang / 'bras bu dang / zhugs pa'i shes pa'i @227b bye brag dang / 'jig rten pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rab tu shes te /
analyzed: shes pa'i lus rnams ni thos pa dang / bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pa'i bye brag dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pa'i bye brag dang / 'bras bu dang / zhugs pa'i shes pa'i @227b bye brag dang / 'jig rten pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rab tu shes te /
translated: The bodies of knowledge are fully known through the distinctions of knowledge that arise from hearing and reflection, the distinctions of knowledge that arise from meditation, the distinctions of knowledge of the fruits and the approachers, and the distinctions of mundane and so on.

original: gang gi phyir shes pa'i lus rnams kyi shin tu dpyad pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir shes pa'i lus rnams kyi shin tu dpyad pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: Because the bodies of knowledge are fully known through thorough analysis.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du nges par rtogs pa nyid dang / 'bras bu dang / sbyor bas bsdus pa nyid dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par dbye ba nyid dang / theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa nyid dang /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du nges par rtogs pa nyid dang / 'bras bu dang / sbyor bas bsdus pa nyid dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par dbye ba nyid dang / theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa nyid dang /
translated: It is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.

original: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid dang / nges par 'byin pa nyid dang / nges par 'byin pa ma yin pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa nyid dang / nges par 'byin pa nyid dang / nges par 'byin pa ma yin pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.

original: chos kyi lus rnams ni chos nyid gcig brjod pa dang / ji skad thos pa bzhin du 'dzin pa dang / gdul bya rnams kyi dbang po la sogs pa'i gnas skabs dang mthun pa'i 'du shes dang / 'chad pa rnam par gzhag pa dang / dbang po dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: chos kyi lus rnams ni chos nyid gcig brjod pa dang / ji skad thos pa bzhin du 'dzin pa dang / gdul bya rnams kyi dbang po la sogs pa'i gnas skabs dang mthun pa'i 'du shes dang / 'chad pa rnam par gzhag pa dang / dbang po dang bcas pa dang /
translated: It is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.üîΩIt is the knowledge of the body of truth, the knowledge of the body of enjoyment, and the knowledge of the transformation body.

original: dbang po med pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa dang / mchog gi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pas rab tu shes pa ste /
analyzed: dbang po med pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa dang / mchog gi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pas rab tu shes pa ste /
translated: It is fully understood through the definition of the absence of faculties and the definition of the supreme.

original: gang gi phyir chos kyi lus rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos kyi lus rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: Because it is fully understood that the bodies of Dharma are also the same.

original: mi 'khrugs pa nyid dang / gnas skabs dang / brda kun rdzob tu rnam par gzhag pa dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa'i chos rnam par gzhag pa nyid dang ; sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnam par gzhag pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'khrugs pa nyid dang / gnas skabs dang / brda kun rdzob tu rnam par gzhag pa dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa'i chos rnam par gzhag pa nyid dang ; sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnam par gzhag pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is fully understood that they are also the definition of the unshakable, the definition of the occasion, the definition of the conventional designation, the definition of the phenomena of sentient beings and non-sentient beings, and the definition of the Buddha, Dharma, and noble Sangha.

original: nam mkha'i lus rnams ni mtha' yas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / khyab pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / gzugs kyi sgo 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
analyzed: nam mkha'i lus rnams ni mtha' yas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / khyab pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / gzugs kyi sgo 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
translated: The bodies of space are the definition of infinity, the definition of pervasion, the definition of being undemonstrable and unobstructing, the definition of being unconditioned, and the definition of opening the door of form.

original: gzugs kyi de mngon pa'i phyir dang / rang gi mtshan nyid du rab tu shes pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de mngon pa'i phyir dang / rang gi mtshan nyid du rab tu shes pa ste /
translated: Because of the manifestation of that form, and because of the thorough knowledge of its own characteristics.

original: gang gi phyir nam mkha'i lus rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir nam mkha'i lus rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
translated: Because of the thorough knowledge of the immeasurability of the bodies of space.

original: thams cad du song ba nyid dang / lus med pa nyid dang / nor ba med pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi lus kyis mngon par gsal bar byed pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du song ba nyid dang / lus med pa nyid dang / nor ba med pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi lus kyis mngon par gsal bar byed pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: The thorough knowledge of omnipresence, the thorough knowledge of incorporeality, the thorough knowledge of non-error, and the thorough knowledge of the manifestation by the body of form.

original: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pas /
analyzed: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pas /
translated: Thus, by means of the purification of the Buddha-land,üîΩthe arrangement of the eighth stage has been revealed.

original: sa brgyad pa'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas dbang thob pas ston to //üîΩde la dbang thob pas ni de lta de ltar snod kyi 'jig rten @228a * //
analyzed: sa brgyad pa'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas dbang thob pas ston to // de la dbang thob pas ni de lta de ltar snod kyi 'jig rten @228a * //
translated: By the attainment of mastery, the teaching is revealed.üîΩThere, by the attainment of mastery, by the application of the three kinds of mastery over the world of the vessel,

original: dang ; sems can gyi 'jig rten dang / ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dbang ba rnam pa gsum gyi sbyor bas dbang bcu rab tu 'thob ste /
analyzed: dang ; sems can gyi 'jig rten dang / ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dbang ba rnam pa gsum gyi sbyor bas dbang bcu rab tu 'thob ste /
translated: over the world of beings, and over the manifestation of gnosis, the ten masteries are fully attained.

original: gang gi phyir des lus dang shes pa mngon par sgrub pa de lta bu thob pas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshe byin gyis rlob pas tshe la dbang ba 'thob bo //
analyzed: gang gi phyir des lus dang shes pa mngon par sgrub pa de lta bu thob pas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshe byin gyis rlob pas tshe la dbang ba 'thob bo //
translated: Because he has attained the ability to manifest bodies and cognitions, he obtains power over life, since he can bless his life to last inexpressibly inexpressible eons.

original: ting nge 'dzin nges par sems dpag tu med pa grangs med pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug pas sems la dbang ba 'thob bo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin nges par sems dpag tu med pa grangs med pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug pas sems la dbang ba 'thob bo //
translated: He obtains power over mind, since he enters into immeasurable, countless concentrations with his wisdom.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan bkod pa du mas rab tu brgyan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kun du ston pas yo byad la dbang ba 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan bkod pa du mas rab tu brgyan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kun du ston pas yo byad la dbang ba 'thob bo //
translated: He obtains power over necessities, since he displays the blessing of adorning all world-realms with many arrays of adornments.

original: las kyi rnam par smin pas byin gyi rlabs kyis dus ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas las la dbang ba 'thob bo //
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pas byin gyi rlabs kyis dus ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas las la dbang ba 'thob bo //
translated: He obtains power over action, since he displays the blessing of the ripening of action in accordance with the time.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba kun du ston pas skye ba la dbang ba 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba kun du ston pas skye ba la dbang ba 'thob bo //
translated: He obtains power over birth, since he displays birth in all world-realms.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / dus gang du ci dga' bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun du ston pas smon lam la dbang ba 'thob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / dus gang du ci dga' bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun du ston pas smon lam la dbang ba 'thob bo //
translated: By demonstrating complete enlightenment whenever and wherever they wish, in whatever buddha-field and in whatever way they wish, they attain power over vows.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gang ba rab tu ston pas mos pa la dbang ba 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gang ba rab tu ston pas mos pa la dbang ba 'thob bo //
translated: By demonstrating all world-realms as filled with buddhas, they attain power over resolve.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa kun du ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba 'thob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa kun du ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba 'thob bo //
translated: By demonstrating all kinds of magical emanations in all buddha-fields, they attain power over miracles.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun du ston pas ye shes la dbang ba 'thob bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa kun du ston pas ye shes la dbang ba 'thob bo //
translated: By demonstrating the powers, the fearlessnesses, the exclusive buddha-qualities, the major marks, the minor signs, and complete enlightenment, they attain power over knowledge.

original: mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba kun du ston pas chos la dbang ba 'thob bo zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba kun du ston pas chos la dbang ba 'thob bo zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: By demonstrating the light of the Dharma door that is without end or middle, they attain power over the Dharma.

original: dbang 'di bcu ni gnod pa bcu'i gnyen por go rims bzhin du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: dbang 'di bcu ni gnod pa bcu'i gnyen por go rims bzhin du rig par bya ste /
translated: These ten masteries should be understood as the antidotes to ten kinds of injury.

original: gnod pa bcu ni /
analyzed: gnod pa bcu ni /
translated: The ten injuries are

original: 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa dang / dbul ba'i gnod pa dang / nyes par spyad pa'i gnod pa dang / ngan 'gro'i gnod pa dang / 'dod pa mi 'grub pa'i gnod pa dang / chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa'i gnod pa dang /
analyzed: 'chi ba'i gnod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnod pa dang / dbul ba'i gnod pa dang / nyes par spyad pa'i gnod pa dang / ngan 'gro'i gnod pa dang / 'dod pa mi 'grub pa'i gnod pa dang / chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa'i gnod pa dang /
translated: the injury of death, the injury of defilement, the injury of poverty, the injury of bad practice, the injury of bad destiny, the injury of unfulfilled desire, the injury of the obstacle of action which leads to the loss of the Dharma,

original: kun du tshol ba la 'bad pa'i gnod pa dang / the tshom gyi gnod pa dang / bag tsha ba'i gnod pa'o //üîΩde ltar dbang thob pas sa rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: kun du tshol ba la 'bad pa'i gnod pa dang / the tshom gyi gnod pa dang / bag tsha ba'i gnod pa'o // de ltar dbang thob pas sa rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /
translated: the injury of the effort to seek everywhere, the injury of doubt, and the injury of fear.

original: che ba nyid kyi khyad par gyis ston to //
analyzed: che ba nyid kyi khyad par gyis ston to //
translated: Having thus taught the stages of the ten stages by means of the ten masteries, he teaches the special greatness.

original: de la che ba nyid kyi @228b khyad par ni che ba nyid rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de la che ba nyid kyi @228b khyad par ni che ba nyid rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The special greatness is the three kinds of greatness.

original: ye shes kyis che ba nyid dang / las kyis che ba nyid dang / de gnyi ga'i gnas yon tan gyis che ba nyid do //üîΩde la ye shes kyis che ba nyid ni 'khor pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la /
analyzed: ye shes kyis che ba nyid dang / las kyis che ba nyid dang / de gnyi ga'i gnas yon tan gyis che ba nyid do // de la ye shes kyis che ba nyid ni 'khor pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la /
translated: The greatness of knowledge, the greatness of action, and the greatness of the qualities that are the basis of both of those.

original: mi gnas pas ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de /
analyzed: mi gnas pas ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de /
translated: The greatness of knowledge is the inconceivability of knowledge, because it does not abide in either cyclic existence or nirvana.

original: gang gi phyir de byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu po de dag thob ma thag nas /üîΩye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu po de dag thob ma thag nas / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Immediately after the bodhisattva obtains those ten masteries, he is endowed with inconceivable knowledge.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de nyid de yang bsgom pa khyad zhugs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang / shes bya rtogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de nyid de yang bsgom pa khyad zhugs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang / shes bya rtogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste /
translated: That inconceivability should be understood as threefold: the inconceivability of the distinctive meditation, the inconceivability of the realization of objects of knowledge, and the inconceivability of the removal of countering factors.

original: gang gi phyir ye shes dpag tu med pa dang / ye shes shin tu rgyas pa dang / ye shes mi 'phrogs pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ye shes dpag tu med pa dang / ye shes shin tu rgyas pa dang / ye shes mi 'phrogs pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: because he has immeasurable knowledge, extensive knowledge, and invincible knowledge.

original: de de lta bu'i rjes su song zhing ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas /
analyzed: de de lta bu'i rjes su song zhing ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas /
translated: Having become like that, and having attained such knowledge,

original: lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa kun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung /
analyzed: lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa kun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung /
translated: he undertakes physical actions that are completely without fault.

original: ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa kun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung /
analyzed: ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa kun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung /
translated: He undertakes verbal actions that are completely without fault.

original: yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa zhes gsungs pa'o //üîΩde de lta bu'i rjes su song zhing zhes bya ba ni sngar ji skad bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa zhes gsungs pa'o // de de lta bu'i rjes su song zhing zhes bya ba ni sngar ji skad bstan pa'o //
translated: He undertakes mental actions that are completely without fault.üîΩHaving become like that means as previously explained.

original: ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas zhes bya ba ni ji skad bstan pa de'o //
analyzed: ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas zhes bya ba ni ji skad bstan pa de'o //
translated: Having attained such knowledge means as previously explained.

original: lus la sogs pa'i las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa kun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba ni las kyis che ba nyid do //
analyzed: lus la sogs pa'i las kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa kun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba ni las kyis che ba nyid do //
translated: He undertakes physical actions, etc. that are completely without fault. This is the greatness of his actions.

original: kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa de yang rnam pa bzhi sa yongs su ston te /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba shin tu med pa de yang rnam pa bzhi sa yongs su ston te /
translated: That absence of any fault is shown to have four aspects.

original: kun du 'byung ba ni kun du 'byung bar byed pa dang / kun du 'byung ba'i dus na ste /
analyzed: kun du 'byung ba ni kun du 'byung bar byed pa dang / kun du 'byung ba'i dus na ste /
translated: The origination is the origination of the origination and the time of the origination.

original: gang gi phyir ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Because it is said that the knowledge precedes and the knowledge follows.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / sems can gyi don byed pa'i las gnyis kyis lam yongs su 'dzin pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / sems can gyi don byed pa'i las gnyis kyis lam yongs su 'dzin pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The path is fully taken up by the two actions of being without defilement and accomplishing the aims of beings.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dbang byed pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dbang byed pa /
translated: Because it is said that it is governed by the perfection of wisdom.

original: snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i thabs mkhas pas shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i thabs mkhas pas shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is well differentiated by the skillful means that is preceded by great compassion.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi sbyor ba'i rgyu gnyis kyis rgyu yongs su 'dzin pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi sbyor ba'i rgyu gnyis kyis rgyu yongs su 'dzin pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The cause is fully taken up by the two causes of one's own application and the application of others.

original: smon lam gyis shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa /
analyzed: smon lam gyis shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa /
translated: Because it is said to be well accomplished by aspiration.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi @229a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi @229a * //
translated: It is the empowerment of the Tathagata.

original: rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is said to be very much blessed by the waves.üîΩüîΩ

original: sems can gyi don dang / zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa'i bya ba ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi don dang / zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sgrub pa'i bya ba ste /
translated: The activity of benefiting sentient beings, purifying the realm, and accomplishing the qualities of a buddhaüîΩis the activity of accomplishment.

original: bya ba sgrub pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: bya ba sgrub pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: Because of that,üîΩthe uninterrupted application to benefiting sentient beings

original: sems can gyi don la sbyor ba rgyun ma bcad pa /üîΩ'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rnam par phye bar gyur pa /üîΩkun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung ngo //üîΩkye rgyal ba'i sras mdor na byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can gyi don la sbyor ba rgyun ma bcad pa / 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rnam par phye bar gyur pa / kun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung ngo // kye rgyal ba'i sras mdor na byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi las ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: arises in the distinctions of infinite world systems.

original: kun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: kun du 'byung ba rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is the arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of the arising of the

original: de la yon tan gyis che ba nyid ni bsam pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa la sogs pas yongs su ston to //
analyzed: de la yon tan gyis che ba nyid ni bsam pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa la sogs pas yongs su ston to //
translated: The greatness of its qualities is shown by its being based on the power of intention and so on.

original: de ni yon tan rnam pa bdun gyis dbang du byas pa ste /
analyzed: de ni yon tan rnam pa bdun gyis dbang du byas pa ste /
translated: It is governed by seven qualities:

original: mi gnas pa'i lam gyi yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i lam gyi yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The quality of the non-abiding path is shown by the fact that

original: de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob pas nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa mi g-yo ba 'di thob pas nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir /
translated: because he has attained this stage of the bodhisattva, he is free from all the afflictions that arise.

original: bsam pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin /
analyzed: bsam pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin /
translated: He is based on the power of intention.

original: las dang mi bral ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin /üîΩsems can gyi don mi gtong ba'i phyir /üîΩsnying rje chen po'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin /üîΩ'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir /
analyzed: las dang mi bral ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin / sems can gyi don mi gtong ba'i phyir / snying rje chen po'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir /
translated: He is based on the power of superior intention because he is never separated from his actions.üîΩHe is based on the power of great compassion because he never abandons the welfare of sentient beings.

original: byams pa chen po'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: He is based on the power of great love because he protects all beings.

original: de la mi gnas pa'i lam nyid ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par nyams shing gnyen po bsten pa dang sems can la lta ba rnam pa gnyis kyis rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de la mi gnas pa'i lam nyid ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par nyams shing gnyen po bsten pa dang sems can la lta ba rnam pa gnyis kyis rig par bya'o //
translated: The path of non-abiding should be understood by two kinds of consideration: the degeneration of adverse factors and the cultivation of antidotes, and the consideration of sentient beings.

original: brjod pa med pa nyid kyi yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: brjod pa med pa nyid kyi yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The quality of being inexpressible is stated because

original: brjed pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: brjed pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir /
translated: he is endowed with the Dharma of non-forgetfulness.

original: gzugs kyi stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: He is said to be well-established in the power of form.

original: ngag phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: ngag phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The quality of verbal perfection is stated because

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa'i phyir /
translated: he is skilled in the distinctions of the thorough differentiation of all the Buddha dharmas.

original: spobs pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: He is said to be well-established in the power of eloquence.

original: sems phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: sems phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The quality of mental perfection is stated becauseüîΩhe is skilled in the distinctions of the thorough differentiation of all the Buddha dharmas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa'i stobs la @229b shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa rnam par dbye ba la mkhas pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa'i stobs la @229b shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: and because of skill in the classification of the conduct of the infinite world-realms, he is well-established in the power of the superknowledges.

original: rgyu'i yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: rgyu'i yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The quality of cause is indicated by the passage beginning:

original: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad mi gtong ba'i phyir smon lam gyi stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba thams cad mi gtong ba'i phyir smon lam gyi stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: and because he does not abandon any of the activities of the bodhisattva, he is well-established in the power of vow.

original: sbyor ba'i yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: sbyor ba'i yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The quality of application is indicated by the passage beginning:

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: and because he accomplishes all the qualities of the Buddha, he is well-established in the power of the perfections.

original: nye bar sgrub pa'i yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: nye bar sgrub pa'i yon tan ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The quality of attainment is indicated by the passage beginning:

original: rnam pa thams cad kun mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kun mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: and because he has realized the gnosis which is the knowledge of all the modes,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs la shin tu gnas pa yin zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: he is well-established in the power of the blessing of the Tathagata.

original: de de lta bu'i stobs bskyed pa thob pas bya ba thams cad kyang kun du ston la zhes bya ba ni rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa rnams kyis kun du spyad pa rnams so //
analyzed: de de lta bu'i stobs bskyed pa thob pas bya ba thams cad kyang kun du ston la zhes bya ba ni rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa rnams kyis kun du spyad pa rnams so //
translated: And by attaining that kind of power, he demonstrates all activities means that he demonstrates all the activities of those who are still subject to the passions, who are accompanied by attachment, hostility, etc.

original: bya ba thams cad la yang kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni yon tan de dag gis so //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad la yang kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni yon tan de dag gis so //
translated: And he is without any transgression in all activities means that he is without any transgression in all activities of those who are still subject to the passions.

original: de ltar che ba nyid kyi khyad par gyis sa 'di'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar che ba nyid kyi khyad par gyis sa 'di'i rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the definition of this stage by way of its greatness,

original: nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye bas ston to //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye bas ston to //
translated: he teaches its definition by way of its etymology.

original: de la nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de la nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The etymology is twofold:

original: sa'i nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / gang zag gi nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba'o //
analyzed: sa'i nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / gang zag gi nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba'o //
translated: the etymology of the stage and the etymology of the person.

original: de la sa'i nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba ni rnam pa drug tu rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de la sa'i nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba ni rnam pa drug tu rig par bya ste /
translated: The etymology of the stage should be understood as sixfold:

original: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The antidote to the secondary defilements is the secondary defilements themselves, which are of two kinds:

original: sa 'og ma pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa dang / theg pa dman par smon lam 'debs pa dang / bdud kyi las dang ; nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: sa 'og ma pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa dang / theg pa dman par smon lam 'debs pa dang / bdud kyi las dang ; nyon mongs pa kun du 'byung ba ste /
translated: the formative influence of the lower stage and the aspiration for the Individual Vehicle, the activities of Mara and the occurrence of the defilements.üîΩThe antidote to these is the Immovable Stage, because the knowledge of the bodhisattva is not carried away by them.

original: de'i gnyen por kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir mi g-yo ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i gnyen por kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir mi g-yo ba zhes bya'o //
translated: The antidote to the defilements is the Stage of Direct Vision, because the knowledge of the bodhisattva is not turned back by them.üîΩThe antidote to the secondary defilements is the Far-Reaching Stage, because it is the stage of the perfection of energy, and the secondary defilements are not able to overpower it.üîΩThe antidote to the defilements is the Immovable Stage, because the knowledge of the bodhisattva is not carried away by them.üîΩThe antidote to the secondary defilements is the Far-Reaching Stage, because it is the stage of the perfection of energy, and the
